page.title: 20THE REGAL CINEMA
page.content: The cinema has always been called the Regal since it opened in July 1934. John Welch took over in 1977. He turned the stalls into shops, the cafe into Studio 2 and the circle into Studio 1.The profits from the shops help to run the cinema.The films lose money. Holiday-makers use the Regal and local people from all over Exmoor.The next cinema is 25 miles away. Audiences vary in size from zero to a full house.James Bond films are the most succesful especially The Spy Who Loved Me. Mr Welch runs the Regal single handed with part-time help.He is projection- -ist,ice-cream seller,cleaner,and shopkeeper.He enjoys his work except the cleaning. Studio 1 is also used for pantomimes and plays by amateur groups.
